snippet: British Sky Broadcasting Group Plc is trying to gain control of Sky Deutschland AG and Sky Italia through a deal valued at 10 billion euros (8.16 billion pounds), Bloomberg reported quoting people familiar with the situation....

headline.print_headline: BSkyB Moves to Gain Control of Sky Deutschland, Sky Italia- Bloomberg
headline.main: BSkyB Moves to Gain Control of Sky Deutschland, Sky Italia- Bloomberg

lead_paragraph: British Sky Broadcasting Group Plc is trying to gain control of Sky Deutschland AG and Sky Italia through a deal valued at 10 billion euros (8.16 billion pounds), Bloomberg reported quoting people familiar with the situation.
